name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened (2007)
description:
Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened (2007) is an adventure game developed by Frogwares. It came out on 15-02-2007. Ascaron Entertainment published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened (2007) has a score of 73. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened (2007) is available on PC.
